column4: hey folks. i need to nuke my evolution user files in 12.04 because i can't delete any messages (program freezes). i've tried removing the folder in .config/ and .cache and .local but it still has my account setup on startup.
(used to just delete ~/.evolution but they moved the files in 12.04)
I think synaptic tells you all the locations a bit of software stores its config files
that will show me the files installed by the package. i'm looking for the config files for my user.
